ns0:entry.ns0:title: DataExpert-io/data-engineer-handbook
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/DataExpert-io/data-engineer-handbook
Language: jupyter-notebook
This is a repo with links to everything you'd ever want to learn about data engineering

ns0:entry.ns0:title: DataTalksClub/llm-zoomcamp
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/DataTalksClub/llm-zoomcamp
Language: jupyter-notebook
LLM Zoomcamp - a free online course about real-life applications of LLMs. In 10 weeks you will learn how to build an AI system that answers questions about your knowledge base.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai
Language: jupyter-notebook
Sample code and notebooks for Generative AI on Google Cloud, with Gemini on Vertex AI

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HandsOnLLM/Hands-On-Large-Language-Models
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HandsOnLLM/Hands-On-Large-Language-Models
Language: jupyter-notebook
Official code repo for the O'Reilly Book - "Hands-On Large Language Models"

ns0:entry.ns0:title: NirDiamant/RAG_Techniques
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/NirDiamant/RAG_Techniques
Language: jupyter-notebook
This repository showcases various advanced techniques for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. RAG systems combine information retrieval with generative models to provide accurate and contextually rich responses.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Pierian-Data/Complete-Python-3-Bootcamp
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Pierian-Data/Complete-Python-3-Bootcamp
Language: jupyter-notebook
Course Files for Complete Python 3 Bootcamp Course on Udemy

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ed-donner/llm_engineering
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ed-donner/llm_engineering
Language: jupyter-notebook
Repo to accompany my mastering LLM engineering course

ns0:entry.ns0:title: fpgaminer/joycaption
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/fpgaminer/joycaption
Language: jupyter-notebook
JoyCaption is an image captioning Visual Language Model (VLM) being built from the ground up as a free, open, and uncensored model for the community to use in training Diffusion models.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: karpathy/micrograd
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/karpathy/micrograd
Language: jupyter-notebook
A tiny scalar-valued autograd engine and a neural net library on top of it with PyTorch-like API

ns0:entry.ns0:title: mrdbourke/pytorch-deep-learning
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/mrdbourke/pytorch-deep-learning
Language: jupyter-notebook
Materials for the Learn PyTorch for Deep Learning: Zero to Mastery course.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: panaversity/learn-agentic-ai
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/panaversity/learn-agentic-ai
Language: jupyter-notebook
Learn Agentic AI using Dapr Agentic Cloud Ascent (DACA) Design Pattern and Agent-Native Cloud Technologies: OpenAI Agents SDK, Memory, MCP, A2A, Knowledge Graphs, Dapr, Rancher Desktop, and Kubernetes.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: pyannote/pyannote-audio
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/pyannote/pyannote-audio
Language: jupyter-notebook
Neural building blocks for speaker diarization: speech activity detection, speaker change detection, overlapped speech detection, speaker embedding

ns0:entry.ns0:title: rasbt/LLMs-from-scratch
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/rasbt/LLMs-from-scratch
Language: jupyter-notebook
Implement a ChatGPT-like LLM in PyTorch from scratch, step by step
